name: armescpu
description: A cpu emulator written in TS

scripts.build:
npm run lint; printf "> Cleaning up	"; true || rm -rf dist/*; printf "✅
"; printf "> Building	"; tsc; printf "✅
"
scripts.build:rom: npm run build && echo "> Starting rom creation tool" && node dist/rom.js
scripts.build:ram: npm run build && echo "> Starting ram creation tool" && node dist/ram.js

author: ThePerkinrex
